events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return the product because it doesn't meet my expectations and I'd like a full refund.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to customer dissatisfaction with the delivered product.
The case has been assigned to an agent specialized in refund processing for further assistance.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like to return your product and request a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for return so I can initiate the refund process?
My order number is 123456789. I want to return the product because it looks very different from the photos and doesn't function as described.
Thank you for the details. I have processed your refund request. Please ship the product back using the prepaid label I will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I'll send the product back today using the label you provide.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. The money should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with the resolution provided.
Since we have not heard otherwise, we will now close your case. Please contact us again if you need further assistance.
